title: AI godfather Yann LeCun: ChatGPT tech is wrong ; leaving Meta to prove it
description: Meta's chief AI scientist Yann LeCun, a Turing Award winner and one of the godfathers of AI, says large language models powering ChatGPT and similar chatbots are fundamentally flawed and will never achieve human-level intelligence. He's leaving Meta to launch a startup focused on "world models," which learn through visual data like humans do. LeCun argues current AI systems are less intelligent than cats and warns the industry's $100+ billion LLM investment is misguided, marking a dramatic split from his employer's strategy.

title: The myth of the ‘normal’: what does your lab report really mean?

description: A software engineer, missing since October 27, was found buried in a house in Kuppam, Andhra Pradesh. Police arrested his cousin, Prabhakar, and an associate for the murder. Prabhakar confessed to killing the victim over a Rs 40 lakh business investment that went sour.

title: Trump threatens ABC News for reporter’s questions on his family business in Saudi Arabia, Khashoggi’s murder and Epstein files
description: After asking ABC News’ Mary Bruce who she worked for, Mr. Trump called ABC “fake news” and defended his family’s business operations in Saudi Arabia

description: Tamil Nadu, one of India’s most urbanised and industrialised States, has been facing rising temperatures, erratic rainfall, and frequent extreme weather events.

title: When a policeman casually took a powerful bomb inside police station in Chennai
description: The incident involving ‘tiffin box bomb’ in Tamil Nadu in 1998 is worth recalling in light of the accidental blast of seized explosives at the Nowgam police station in Jammu and Kashmir on November 14, 2025, which led to death of nine persons.

description: Former Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar met his successor C P Radhakrishnan in a courtesy meeting, marking their first formal interaction since Dhankhar's resignation. Dhankhar had stepped down citing health reasons and is currently residing in a private accommodation while awaiting his retirement residence.

title: Meta wins major antitrust case as US judge rules no monopoly
description: Judge James Boasberg of the federal district court in Washington concluded that Meta faces sufficient competition from rivals TikTok and YouTube, preventing the company from exercising monopoly power in the social media market

6 warning signs of kidney damage from taking too much vitamin D
description: Excessive Vitamin D supplementation can lead to hypercalcemia, straining the kidneys and causing nephrocalcinosis, potentially resulting in acute kidney injury or failure. Early symptoms like nausea, thirst, and frequent urination signal critical electrolyte imbalances. Careful use under medical supervision and regular monitoring are crucial to prevent overdose and protect kidney health.

title: India's Eden debacle: Underprepared pitch, shoddy technique, lack of specialists - IND vs SA
description: India's debacle at the Eden Gardens against the reigning World Test Champions (WTC) in the first Test has raised a plethora of questions -- the team's preparation after playing a white-ball series in Australia, India batters’ dodgy technique against quality spin and the lack of specialists in the Test squad.

title: IND vs SA: Decoding the drill - Why Sudharsan & Jurel batted with one pad
description: Indian batters Sai Sudharsan and Dhruv Jurel practiced with one pad to improve footwork against spin, an old drill forcing bat usage over pad defense. This comes as Sudharsan is in contention for the second Test against South Africa, who lead the series 1-0 after a first-Test victory.

title: Thirteen people killed in Israeli strike on Lebanon's Sidon, Lebanese Health Ministry says

description: “I’ve stopped actually eight wars... we stopped India and Pakistan. Wish I could go through the list. You know the list better than I do,” Mr. Trump said

title: ‘Attempt to flaunt patriotism’: Ricin terror-plot accused attacked in jail; assaulted by 3 inmates
description: A terror accused, Syed Ahmed Mohiuddin Abdul Qader Jilani, was assaulted by three inmates in Sabarmati Central Jail shortly after his transfer. One attacker reportedly cited patriotism as the motive for the assault, which was quickly intervened by other prisoners. The incident has prompted an investigation into jail security and potential collusion.

title: Yasoda’s concern for Krishna
SC: Justice Bhuyan criticises ruling; CJI Gavai refuses to give rejoinder
description: Justice Ujjal Bhuyan dissented with CJI B R Gavai's recall of a prior judgment, arguing the majority overlooked environmental jurisprudence fundamentals. Justice Bhuyan defended the original verdict, emphasizing the precautionary principle over the 'polluter pays' principle. CJI Gavai noted his departure from tradition by not altering his judgment after receiving the dissent.

description: The neutralization of Madvi Hidma, a key CPI (Maoist) leader, brings security forces closer to Home Minister Amit Shah's goal of ending left-wing extremism by March 2026. Hidma's death is considered a historic milestone, with remaining active cadres estimated between 100-150.  Intelligence suggests Hidma may have been considering surrender before his operation.

Suffering from chronic fatigue and brain fog? Leading neurologist explains
description: Dr. Sudhir Kumar says the ferritin test is important, when it comes to gauging overall health. Ferritin is a protein that stores iron in the body and ferritin levels in the blood, show how much iron is stored. Normal serum iron tests only measure iron that is moving in the blood, and the tests do not show if iron stores are low

title: Coimbatore : PM Modi to release Rs 18k cr; PM-KISAN boost for 9 crore farmers
description: Prime Minister Modi embarks on a significant visit to Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu today. He will pay respects at Puttaparthi, marking Bhagwan Sri Sathya Sai Baba's centenary, and later inaugurate the South India Natural Farming Summit in Coimbatore. Crucially, he will release the 21st installment of Rs 18,000 crore under the PM-KISAN scheme, benefiting nine crore farmers.

title: Yamuna Boat Tourism Project will offer a green tourism experience with electric-solar boats

title: Bihar: BJP, JDU resist Chirag's demand for Dy CM post for his party; negotiations stretch on
description: NDA allies BJP and JDU are resisting LJP(RV)'s demand for a deputy chief minister post in the new Bihar government. Discussions are ongoing as the BJP may retain the Speaker's position, while LJP(RV) seeks representation for its Dalit vote base. The new government's composition reflects shifting power dynamics after the recent election victory.

TikTok twist: How China’s app saved Meta from huge fine
description: A US federal judge dismissed the FTC's antitrust lawsuit against Meta, ruling that the company's acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp did not illegally monopolize the social media market. The judge found that Meta faces significant competition from platforms like TikTok and YouTube, rendering its market dominance obsolete. This decision marks a major victory for Meta after a lengthy legal battle.

How one glass of this drink daily, can boost arterial health and lower blood pressure
description: Boost your heart health with a simple cacao and beetroot drink, recommended by Dr. Eric Berg. This natural concoction enhances nitric oxide production, crucial for relaxing blood vessels and improving circulation.  It helps regulate blood pressure, reduces arterial stiffness, and combats inflammation, offering a powerful, daily defense against cardiovascular risks.

India-US trade deal: No hiatus in ties; Goyal hints at ‘good news’ soon
description: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal indicated that a trade pact between India and the US is nearing completion, emphasizing the need for a fair, equitable, and balanced agreement. He assured that India will continue to protect the interests of its farmers, fishermen, and small industries during ongoing negotiations.

title: TB or Lung Cancer? Know the symptoms and differences
description: India faces a dual challenge with widespread tuberculosis and rising lung cancer, often presenting with similar symptoms like chronic cough and weight loss. This diagnostic overlap, exacerbated by resource constraints and a tendency to suspect TB first, leads to delayed cancer detection.

title: NBA trade rumor: Rockets eye $118M Mavericks star in blockbuster deal
description: Houston Rockets, surprisingly strong early, are exploring a blockbuster trade for Kyrie Irving to fill the void left by Fred VanVleet's season-ending injury. This move would reunite Irving with Kevin Durant, a partnership that previously generated significant excitement. The proposed deal involves trading VanVleet and Dorian Finney-Smith for Irving, offering Houston a veteran playmaker and elite scorer.

title: Trey Benson injury update: Cardinals coach assesses recovery amid slump
description: Arizona Cardinals running back Trey Benson, who replaced an injured James Conner, is sidelined with a brutal knee injury sustained in Week 5. Despite initial hopes for a Week 10 return, his recovery timeline remains unclear. Head coach Jonathan Gannon stated Benson is progressing but not yet ready to play, marking his sixth missed game.

title: Candace Owens sparks chaos with new Britney trafficking claim as Lou Taylor trends
description: Britney Spears shared a heartwarming Instagram video with Kim and Khloé Kardashian, sparking viral attention. Simultaneously, Candace Owens leveled serious accusations on her podcast, alleging Lou Taylor's manipulative control over Britney and other stars, citing an insider email and historical patterns of financial and media exploitation. Owens' claims, though unproven, have ignited significant discussion.

title: Taylor Swift’s ‘The Fate of Ophelia’ seen as revisiting Joe Alwyn breakup, not Kelce
description: Taylor Swift's new song, 'The Fate of Ophelia,' is fueling fan theories linking it to her breakup with Joe Alwyn.  Swifties interpret lyrics about rescue and rebirth as a nod to her current relationship, contrasting it with her past. The track is seen as Taylor Swift reclaiming her narrative, transforming heartbreak into art.

title: Tech company turmoil: Founder who topped Elon Musk loses 30% value - what happened?
description: Larry Ellison briefly surpassed Elon Musk in wealth after Oracle's stock surged on a massive OpenAI cloud deal. However, Oracle's value has since plummeted, erasing those gains and pushing Ellison down the rankings. Musk has since reclaimed his top spot, driven by strong performance in Tesla and SpaceX.
